name: National statuary hall; King Kamehameha I
text: [§6E-38]  National statuary hall; King Kamehameha I.  King Kamehameha I is selected as one of the two illustrious, deceased persons whose statue shall be furnished by the State of Hawaii for placement in the national statuary hall in the national capitol pursuant to Title 40 United States Code 187. [L 1976, c 104, pt of §2]
